div.style: position: relative; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); padding: 100px 0; height: 100%;

h1.style: visibility: visible; animation-duration: 0.2s; animation-delay: 0.3s; animation-name: fadeInDown;

div.style: visibility: visible; animation-duration: 0.5s; animation-delay: 0.5s; animation-name: fadeInDown;
display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 5; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;
display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 3; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;
display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 3; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; margin-bottom: 4.5%;

div.class: col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 text-section text-center

xpath.attribute: not website.sh_website_coming_soon_is_coming_soon or request.httprequest.path=='/web/login' or not request.env.user._is_public()

t.t-value: request.env.user.share and website.sh_website_coming_soon_is_show_to_portal and request.httprequest.path!="/web/login" and not request.env.user._is_public()

t.t-if: website.sh_website_coming_soon_is_coming_soon == True and request.httprequest.path!='/web/login' and request.env.user._is_public() or show_to_portal
